column4: Can anyone help me in getting an HTC Apache tethered to a Mini 9 running Intrepid?
Mini 9 is netbook, htc apache is a cellphone
I have intrepid installed on my netbook, and I want to use my phone as a tethered modem
HOWTO: Use your UTstarcom / PPC-6700 / XV6700 as a USB modem    http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=1866807&postcount=1
